verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they put <S%H7971>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> every <S%H6879>leper,<s%> and everyone who has an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and whoever is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead.<s%>

Both you shall <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> <S%H7971>of<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> that they not <S%H2930>defile<s%> their <S%H4264>camp,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H6213>so,<s%> and put them <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'When a man or <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> any <S%H2403>sin<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H6213>commit,<s%> so as to <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

then he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> and he shall make <S%H7725>restitution<s%> for his <S%H817>guilt<s%> in <S%H7218>full,<s%> and <S%H3254>add<s%> to it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of <S%H5414>it,<s%> and give it to him in respect of whom he has been <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

But if the <S%H376>man<s%> has no <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to whom <S%H7725>restitution<s%> may be made for the <S%H817>guilt,<s%> the <S%H7725>restitution<s%> for <S%H817>guilt<s%> which is made to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s; besides the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> by which atonement shall be made for <S%H3722>him.<s%>
Every heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of all the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they <S%H7126>present<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall be his.
Every <S%H376>man<s%>'s holy <S%H6944>things<s%> shall be <S%H376>his:<s%> whatever any man <S%H5414>gives<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> it shall be his.'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H376>them:<s%> 'If any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> goes <S%H7847>astray,<s%> and <S%H4603>is<s%> unfaithful to <S%H4604>him,<s%>

and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her <S%H7902>carnally,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and is kept <S%H5641>close,<s%> and she is <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and there is no <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H8610>her,<s%> and she isn't taken in the act;

and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> on <S%H7065>him,<s%> and he is jealous of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she is <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> or if the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> on <S%H7065>him,<s%> and he is jealous of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she <S%H2930>isn't<s%> defiled:

then the <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H7133>offering<s%> for <S%H6224>her:<s%> the tenth part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal.<s%> He shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> no <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H5414>it,<s%> nor put <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on <S%H4503>it,<s%> for it is a meal offering of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>memory.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall bring her <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel;<s%> and of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that is on the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it into the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and let the hair of the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%> go <S%H6544>loose,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> which is the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that brings a <S%H779>curse.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall cause her to <S%H7650>swear,<s%> and shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> "If no <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H7901>lain<s%> with <S%H7847>you,<s%> and if you haven't gone aside to <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> being under your <S%H376>husband,<s%> be <S%H5352>free<s%> from this <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that brings a <S%H779>curse.<s%>

But if you have gone <S%H7847>astray,<s%> being under your <S%H376>husband,<s%> and if you are <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and some <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>has<s%> <S%H7903>lain<s%> with you <S%H1107>besides<s%> your <S%H376>husband:<s%>"

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>cause<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> to swear with the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H423>cursing,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>allows<s%> your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to fall <S%H5307>away,<s%> and your <S%H990>body<s%> to <S%H6639>swell;<s%>

and this <S%H4325>water<s%> that brings a <S%H779>curse<s%> will <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H4578>bowels,<s%> and make your <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> fall <S%H5307>away.<s%>" The <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>"
<S%H3548><s%>"'The priest shall <S%H3789>write<s%> these <S%H423>curses<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and he shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> them out into the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness.<s%>

He shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse;<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her and become <S%H4751>bitter.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> out of the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall take a <S%H7061>handful<s%> of the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> as its <S%H234>memorial,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall make the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

When he has made her <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> then it shall <S%H2930>happen,<s%> if she is defiled, and has <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against her <S%H376>husband,<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into her and become <S%H4751>bitter,<s%> and her <S%H990>body<s%> will <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> will fall <S%H5307>away:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> will be a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people.<s%>
If the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2930>isn't<s%> defiled, but is <S%H2889>clean;<s%> then she shall be <S%H5352>free,<s%> and shall <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%>
<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> when a <S%H802>wife,<s%> being under her <S%H376>husband,<s%> goes <S%H7847>astray,<s%> and is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%>

or when the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> on a <S%H376>man,<s%> and he is <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife;<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> on her all this <S%H8451>law.<s%>
The <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>'"
